item.description:
The Artist Way - A Course in Discovering and Recovering Your Creative Self

Come and meet our facilitator Nancy Howell as she introduces us to the book The Artist Way. Whether you are embarking upon your creative journey or trying to restart your artistic engines, Nancy will help you find the resources you need.

This should be a fun afternoon on the lawn at the Larches. Bring a picnic lunch.

Please note ~ This course will be a 16 hour commitment held in 4 sessions. There will be a charge for each session of 35.00. We will need a minimum of 8 people to hold this class at this rate. The dates and times for each session will be discussed at this gathering.
item.name: The Artist Way - A Course in Discovering and Recovering Your Creative Self
